info.title: KSAP - Knowledge System Approval Platform
info.description:
## ナレッジシステム承認プラットフォーム API

KSAPは、ナレッジの修正提案と承認を効率的に管理する包括的なシステムです。

### 主要機能
- **修正案管理**: ナレッジの修正提案を作成・編集・提出し、進捗を追跡
- **承認ワークフロー**: ロールベースのアクセス制御による構造化された承認プロセス
- **差分分析**: 高度な変更検出と影響度評価機能
- **通知システム**: リアルタイム通知とコミュニケーション機能
- **分析・レポート**: 包括的なメトリクスとパフォーマンス分析

### ユーザー権限
- **一般ユーザー**: 自分の修正提案を作成・管理
- **承認者**: 担当領域の提案をレビューし、承認・却下の判断
- **管理者**: ユーザー管理やシステム設定を含む全機能へのアクセス

### 認証について
公開エンドポイント以外の全てのAPIは、JWT Bearer トークン認証が必要です。

**認証ヘッダーの形式:**
```
Authorization: Bearer <JWT アクセストークン>
```

### API構造
- **ベースURL**: `/api/v1`
- **認証方式**: JWT Bearer トークン
- **レスポンス形式**: JSON
- **エラーハンドリング**: 標準HTTPステータスコードと詳細なエラーメッセージ

### 主要エンドポイント
- `/auth/login` - ユーザー認証
- `/proposals/` - 修正提案の管理
- `/approvals/` - 承認ワークフロー
- `/diffs/` - 変更分析
- `/system/health` - ヘルスチェック

### サポート
技術的なサポートや機能要望については、開発チームまでお問い合わせください。

post.description: OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests

schema.title: Response Get Users Api V1 Users  Get

get.description: Get user by ID (own profile or admin)

put.description:
Update own password.

- Users can only update their own password (must provide current password)
- For admin password resets, use /admin-reset-password endpoint

Admin password reset for any user.

- Only admins can use this endpoint
- No current password verification required
- Generates audit log for security

post.description: Withdraw a submitted proposal back to draft

put.description: Update an approved proposal (only approver or admin can update)

schema.title: Response Get My Proposals Api V1 Proposals My Proposals Get

get.description: Get proposals that need approval from current user

schema.title: Response Get Proposals For Approval Api V1 Proposals For Approval Get

post.description: Process an approval decision for a revision

get.description: Get approval queue for current approver

schema.title: Response Get Approval Queue Api V1 Approvals Queue Get

get.description: Get workload information for current approver
Get workload information for a specific approver (admin only)

schema.title: Response Process Bulk Approvals Api V1 Approvals Bulk Post

get.description: Check if current user can approve a specific revision

schema.title: Response Get Approval History Api V1 Approvals History Get

post.description: Quick approval actions with predefined settings

get.description: Get workflow recommendations for improving approval efficiency
Get dynamic approval checklist for a revision
Get detailed diff for a revision proposal
Get summary of changes for a revision
Get current snapshot of an article
Get diff history for an article

schema.title: Response Get Article Diff History Api V1 Diffs Article  Article Id  History Get
Response Compare Revisions Api V1 Diffs Compare Post

get.description: Get formatted diff with display-ready information

schema.title: Response Get Formatted Diff Api V1 Diffs  Revision Id  Formatted Get

post.description: Get summary information for multiple revisions

schema.title: Response Get Bulk Diff Summaries Api V1 Diffs Bulk Summaries Post

get.description: Get statistics about changes over time

Get revisions based on user permissions with proposer and approver names
- Admin: can see all revisions
- All authenticated users: can see submitted/approved revisions + their own draft/rejected

schema.title: Response Get Revisions Api V1 Revisions  Get

post.description: Create new revision with proposer_id automatically set from current user

get.description:
Get current user's own revisions with names and article numbers
- Returns all revisions where the current user is the proposer
- Includes proposer/approver names and article numbers for better display

schema.title: Response Get My Revisions Api V1 Revisions My Revisions Get

get.description: Get revision by ID with permission check

put.description: Update revision - proposer can update draft revisions, approver can update approved revisions

get.description: Get revisions by proposer with permission check

schema.title: Response Get Revisions By Proposer Api V1 Revisions By Proposer  Proposer Id  Get

get.description: Get revisions by status with permission filtering

schema.title: Response Get Revisions By Status Api V1 Revisions By Status  Status  Get

get.description:
Get public revisions (submitted/approved) for a specific article
- All authenticated users can access this endpoint
- Only returns submitted and approved revisions (public revisions)

schema.title: Response Get Revisions By Article Api V1 Revisions By Article  Target Article Id  Get

patch.description: Update revision status - requires approver or admin role

schema.title: Response Get Articles Api V1 Articles  Get

Response Get Article Number By Id Api V1 Articles Number By Id  Article Id  Get
Response Get Info Categories Api V1 Info Categories  Get
Response Get Active Info Categories Api V1 Info Categories Active Get
Response Get Approval Groups Api V1 Approval Groups  Get
Response Get My Notifications Api V1 Notifications My Notifications Get

get.description: Get notification statistics for current user
Get notification digest for current user

post.description: Create notifications for multiple users (admin only)

get.description: Get notifications for a user (legacy endpoint, admin only)

schema.title: Response Get User Notifications Legacy Api V1 Notifications  User Id  Get

post.description: Create new notification (legacy endpoint, admin only)

get.description: Get analytics overview for the current user
Get trend analysis for various metrics
Export analytics data in various formats
